targets.rawSql:
select
  max(e.created_at) as "time"
from
  gha_events e,
  gha_repos r
where
  e.repo_id = r.id
  and e.dup_repo_name = r.name
  and r.repo_group in ([[repogroups]])
  and $__timeFilter(e.created_at)
  and (e.dup_actor_login in ([[contributors]]) or '[[contributors:csv]]' = 'null')
  and lower(e.dup_actor_login) not like all(array['devstats-sync', 'googlebot', 'coveralls', 'rktbot', 'coreosbot', 'web-flow', 'prometheus-roobot', 'cncf-bot', 'kernelprbot', 'istio-testing', 'spinnakerbot', 'pikbot', 'spinnaker-release', 'docker-jenkins', 'golangcibot', 'opencontrail-ci-admin', 'k8s-%', '%-bot', '%-robot', 'bot-%', 'robot-%', '%[bot]%', '%-jenkins', '%-ci%bot', '%-testing', 'codecov-%', '%clabot%', '%cla-bot%', '%-gerrit', '%-bot-%'])
select 1

select
  now() as "time",
  count(e.id) as "value",
  coalesce(a.country_id, '') as "name"
from
  gha_actors a,
  gha_events e,
  gha_repos r
where
  e.repo_id = r.id
  and e.dup_repo_name = r.name
  and r.repo_group in ([[repogroups]])
  and e.dup_actor_login = a.login
  and e.type in ('IssuesEvent', 'PullRequestEvent', 'PushEvent', 'PullRequestReviewCommentEvent', 'IssueCommentEvent', 'CommitCommentEvent')
  and $__timeFilter(e.created_at)
  and (e.dup_actor_login in ([[contributors]]) or '[[contributors:csv]]' = 'null')
  and lower(a.login) not like all(array['devstats-sync', 'googlebot', 'coveralls', 'rktbot', 'coreosbot', 'web-flow', 'prometheus-roobot', 'cncf-bot', 'kernelprbot', 'istio-testing', 'spinnakerbot', 'pikbot', 'spinnaker-release', 'docker-jenkins', 'golangcibot', 'opencontrail-ci-admin', 'k8s-%', '%-bot', '%-robot', 'bot-%', 'robot-%', '%[bot]%', '%-jenkins', '%-ci%bot', '%-testing', 'codecov-%', '%clabot%', '%cla-bot%', '%-gerrit', '%-bot-%'])
group by
  a.country_id

select
  now() as "time",
  count(distinct a.login) as "value",
  coalesce(a.country_id, '') as "name"
from
  gha_actors a,
  gha_events e,
  gha_repos r
where
  e.repo_id = r.id
  and e.dup_repo_name = r.name
  and r.repo_group in ([[repogroups]])
  and e.dup_actor_login = a.login
  and e.type in ('IssuesEvent', 'PullRequestEvent', 'PushEvent', 'PullRequestReviewCommentEvent', 'IssueCommentEvent', 'CommitCommentEvent')
  and $__timeFilter(e.created_at)
  and (e.dup_actor_login in ([[contributors]]) or '[[contributors:csv]]' = 'null')
  and lower(a.login) not like all(array['devstats-sync', 'googlebot', 'coveralls', 'rktbot', 'coreosbot', 'web-flow', 'prometheus-roobot', 'cncf-bot', 'kernelprbot', 'istio-testing', 'spinnakerbot', 'pikbot', 'spinnaker-release', 'docker-jenkins', 'golangcibot', 'opencontrail-ci-admin', 'k8s-%', '%-bot', '%-robot', 'bot-%', 'robot-%', '%[bot]%', '%-jenkins', '%-ci%bot', '%-testing', 'codecov-%', '%clabot%', '%cla-bot%', '%-gerrit', '%-bot-%'])
group by
  a.country_id

panels.description: Percent of repositories active during the last month compared to the number of repositories active during the last year.

targets.rawSql:
select
  sub.time,
  (sub.recent * 100.0) / (case sub.all when 0 then 1 else sub.all end)
from (
  select
    max(e.created_at) as time,
    count(distinct e.repo_id) filter (where e.created_at >= now() - '1 year'::interval) as all,
    count(distinct e.repo_id) filter (where $__timeFilter(e.created_at)) as recent
  from
    gha_events e,
    gha_repos r
  where
    e.repo_id = r.id
    and e.dup_repo_name = r.name
    and r.repo_group in ([[repogroups]])
    and (e.dup_actor_login in ([[contributors]]) or '[[contributors:csv]]' = 'null')
) sub

panels.title: Percent repositories active

targets.rawSql:
select
  sub.time as "time",
  ((sub.current - sub.previous) * 100.0) / (case sub.previous when 0 then 1 else sub.previous end) as "value"
from (
  select
    max(c.dup_created_at) as "time",
    count(distinct c.sha) filter (where c.dup_created_at >= now() - '2 months'::interval and c.dup_created_at < now() - '1 month'::interval) as "previous",
    count(distinct c.sha) filter (where $__timeFilter(c.dup_created_at)) as "current"
  from
    gha_commits c,
    gha_repos r
  where
    c.dup_repo_id = r.id
    and c.dup_repo_name = r.name
    and r.repo_group in ([[repogroups]])
    and (c.dup_author_login in ([[contributors]]) or '[[contributors:csv]]' = 'null')
    and lower(c.dup_author_login) not like all(array['devstats-sync', 'googlebot', 'coveralls', 'rktbot', 'coreosbot', 'web-flow', 'prometheus-roobot', 'cncf-bot', 'kernelprbot', 'istio-testing', 'spinnakerbot', 'pikbot', 'spinnaker-release', 'docker-jenkins', 'golangcibot', 'opencontrail-ci-admin', 'k8s-%', '%-bot', '%-robot', 'bot-%', 'robot-%', '%[bot]%', '%-jenkins', '%-ci%bot', '%-testing', 'codecov-%', '%clabot%', '%cla-bot%', '%-gerrit', '%-bot-%'])
) sub

defaults.displayName: PRs opened compared with last month:

targets.rawSql:
select
  sub.time,
  ((sub.current - sub.previous) * 100.0) / (case sub.previous when 0 then 1 else sub.previous end) as "value"
from (
  select
    max(pr.created_at) as time,
    count(distinct pr.id) filter (where pr.created_at >= now() - '2 months'::interval and pr.created_at < now() - '1 month'::interval) as previous,
    count(distinct pr.id) filter (where $__timeFilter(pr.created_at)) as "current"
  from
    gha_pull_requests pr,
    gha_repos r
  where
    pr.dup_repo_id = r.id
    and pr.dup_repo_name = r.name
    and r.repo_group in ([[repogroups]])
    and (pr.dup_user_login in ([[contributors]]) or '[[contributors:csv]]' = 'null')
) sub

defaults.displayName: PRs merged compared with previous month:

targets.rawSql:
select
  sub.time,
  ((sub.current - sub.previous) * 100.0) / (case sub.previous when 0 then 1 else sub.previous end) as "value"
from (
  select
    max(pr.created_at) as time,
    count(distinct pr.id) filter (where pr.merged_at >= now() - '2 months'::interval and pr.merged_at < now() - '1 month'::interval) as previous,
    count(distinct pr.id) filter (where $__timeFilter(pr.merged_at)) as "current"
  from
    gha_pull_requests pr,
    gha_repos r
  where
    pr.dup_repo_id = r.id
    and pr.dup_repo_name = r.name
    and r.repo_group in ([[repogroups]])
    and (pr.dup_user_login in ([[contributors]]) or '[[contributors:csv]]' = 'null')
) sub

defaults.displayName: Median time to merge PRs (the previous month):

targets.rawSql:
select
  percentile_disc(0.5) within group (order by sub.time_to_merge asc) as "value"
from (
  select distinct
    pr.id,
    max(pr.merged_at) - max(pr.created_at) as time_to_merge
  from
    gha_pull_requests pr,
    gha_repos r
  where
    pr.dup_repo_id = r.id
    and pr.dup_repo_name = r.name
    and r.repo_group in ([[repogroups]])
    and pr.merged_at is not null
    and pr.dup_type = 'PullRequestEvent'
    and pr.merged_at >= now() - '2 months'::interval
    and pr.merged_at < now() - '1 month'::interval
    and (pr.dup_user_login in ([[contributors]]) or '[[contributors:csv]]' = 'null')
  group by
    pr.id
) sub

defaults.displayName: Median time to merge PRs (the last month):

targets.rawSql:
select
  percentile_disc(0.5) within group (order by sub.time_to_merge asc) as "value"
from (
  select distinct
    pr.id,
    max(pr.merged_at) - max(pr.created_at) as time_to_merge
  from
    gha_pull_requests pr,
    gha_repos r
  where
    pr.dup_repo_id = r.id
    and pr.dup_repo_name = r.name
    and r.repo_group in ([[repogroups]])
    and pr.merged_at is not null
    and pr.dup_type = 'PullRequestEvent'
    and $__timeFilter(pr.merged_at)
    and (pr.dup_user_login in ([[contributors]]) or '[[contributors:csv]]' = 'null')
  group by
    pr.id
) sub

defaults.displayName: Diff of the median time to merge PRs.

targets.rawSql:
with curr as (
  select
    extract(epoch from percentile_disc(0.5) within group (order by sub.time_to_merge asc)) as "value"
  from (
    select distinct
      pr.id,
      max(pr.merged_at) - max(pr.created_at) as time_to_merge
    from
      gha_pull_requests pr,
      gha_repos r
    where
      pr.dup_repo_id = r.id
      and pr.dup_repo_name = r.name
      and r.repo_group in ([[repogroups]])
      and pr.merged_at is not null
      and pr.dup_type = 'PullRequestEvent'
      and $__timeFilter(pr.merged_at)
      and (pr.dup_user_login in ([[contributors]]) or '[[contributors:csv]]' = 'null')
    group by
      pr.id
  ) sub
), prev as (
  select
    extract(epoch from percentile_disc(0.5) within group (order by sub.time_to_merge asc)) as "value"
  from (
    select distinct
      pr.id,
      max(pr.merged_at) - max(pr.created_at) as time_to_merge
    from
      gha_pull_requests pr,
      gha_repos r
    where
      pr.dup_repo_id = r.id
      and pr.dup_repo_name = r.name
      and r.repo_group in ([[repogroups]])
      and pr.merged_at is not null
      and pr.dup_type = 'PullRequestEvent'
      and pr.merged_at >= now() - '2 month'::interval
      and pr.merged_at < now() - '1 month'::interval
      and (pr.dup_user_login in ([[contributors]]) or '[[contributors:csv]]' = 'null')
    group by
      pr.id
  ) sub
)
select
  ((curr.value - prev.value) * 100.0) / (case prev.value when 0 then 1 else prev.value end) as "value"
from
  prev,
  curr

select
  $__timeGroupAlias(c.dup_created_at,1h),
  count(distinct c.sha) as "commits"
from
  gha_commits c,
  gha_repos r
where
  c.dup_repo_id = r.id
  and c.dup_repo_name = r.name
  and r.repo_group in ([[repogroups]])
  and $__timeFilter(c.dup_created_at)
  and (c.dup_author_login in ([[contributors]]) or '[[contributors:csv]]' = 'null')
  and lower(c.dup_author_login) not like all(array['devstats-sync', 'googlebot', 'coveralls', 'rktbot', 'coreosbot', 'web-flow', 'prometheus-roobot', 'cncf-bot', 'kernelprbot', 'istio-testing', 'spinnakerbot', 'pikbot', 'spinnaker-release', 'docker-jenkins', 'golangcibot', 'opencontrail-ci-admin', 'k8s-%', '%-bot', '%-robot', 'bot-%', 'robot-%', '%[bot]%', '%-jenkins', '%-ci%bot', '%-testing', 'codecov-%', '%clabot%', '%cla-bot%', '%-gerrit', '%-bot-%'])
group by
  1

panels.title: Last month commits per day and hour

targets.rawSql:
select
  count(distinct e.id) as "value",
  e.dup_repo_name as "name"
from
  gha_events e,
  gha_repos r
where
  e.repo_id = r.id
  and e.dup_repo_name = r.name
  and r.repo_group in ([[repogroups]])
  and $__timeFilter(e.created_at)
  and e.type in ('IssuesEvent', 'PullRequestEvent', 'PushEvent', 'PullRequestReviewCommentEvent', 'IssueCommentEvent', 'CommitCommentEvent')
  and (e.dup_actor_login in ([[contributors]]) or '[[contributors:csv]]' = 'null')
  and lower(e.dup_actor_login) not like all(array['devstats-sync', 'googlebot', 'coveralls', 'rktbot', 'coreosbot', 'web-flow', 'prometheus-roobot', 'cncf-bot', 'kernelprbot', 'istio-testing', 'spinnakerbot', 'pikbot', 'spinnaker-release', 'docker-jenkins', 'golangcibot', 'opencontrail-ci-admin', 'k8s-%', '%-bot', '%-robot', 'bot-%', 'robot-%', '%[bot]%', '%-jenkins', '%-ci%bot', '%-testing', 'codecov-%', '%clabot%', '%cla-bot%', '%-gerrit', '%-bot-%'])
group by
  e.dup_repo_name
order by
  value desc
limit
  50

select
  count(distinct e.id) as "value",
  coalesce(affs.company_name, 'Unknown') as "name"
from
  gha_repos r,
  gha_events e
left join
  gha_actors_affiliations affs
on
  e.actor_id = affs.actor_id
  and affs.dt_from <= e.created_at
  and affs.dt_to > e.created_at
where
  e.repo_id = r.id
  and e.dup_repo_name = r.name
  and r.repo_group in ([[repogroups]])
  and $__timeFilter(e.created_at)
  and e.type in ('IssuesEvent', 'PullRequestEvent', 'PushEvent', 'PullRequestReviewCommentEvent', 'IssueCommentEvent', 'CommitCommentEvent')
  and affs.company_name is not null
  and (e.dup_actor_login in ([[contributors]]) or '[[contributors:csv]]' = 'null')
  and lower(e.dup_actor_login) not like all(array['ti-srebot', 'devstats-sync', 'googlebot', 'coveralls', 'rktbot', 'coreosbot', 'web-flow', 'prometheus-roobot', 'cncf-bot', 'kernelprbot', 'istio-testing', 'spinnakerbot', 'pikbot', 'spinnaker-release', 'docker-jenkins', 'golangcibot', 'opencontrail-ci-admin', 'k8s-%', '%-bot', '%-robot', 'bot-%', 'robot-%', '%[bot]%', '%-jenkins', '%-ci%bot', '%-testing', 'codecov-%', '%clabot%', '%cla-bot%', '%-gerrit', '%-bot-%'])
group by
  affs.company_name
order by
  value desc
limit
  50

select
  count(distinct e.id) as "value",
  e.dup_actor_login as "name"
from
  gha_events e,
  gha_repos r
where
  e.repo_id = r.id
  and e.dup_repo_name = r.name
  and r.repo_group in ([[repogroups]])
  and $__timeFilter(e.created_at)
  and e.type in ('IssuesEvent', 'PullRequestEvent', 'PushEvent', 'PullRequestReviewCommentEvent', 'IssueCommentEvent', 'CommitCommentEvent')
  and (e.dup_actor_login in ([[contributors]]) or '[[contributors:csv]]' = 'null')
  and lower(e.dup_actor_login) not like all(array['ti-srebot', 'devstats-sync', 'googlebot', 'coveralls', 'rktbot', 'coreosbot', 'web-flow', 'prometheus-roobot', 'cncf-bot', 'kernelprbot', 'istio-testing', 'spinnakerbot', 'pikbot', 'spinnaker-release', 'docker-jenkins', 'golangcibot', 'opencontrail-ci-admin', 'k8s-%', '%-bot', '%-robot', 'bot-%', 'robot-%', '%[bot]%', '%-jenkins', '%-ci%bot', '%-testing', 'codecov-%', '%clabot%', '%cla-bot%', '%-gerrit', '%-bot-%'])
group by
  e.dup_actor_login
order by
  value desc
limit
  50

select
  count(distinct c.sha) as "value",
  coalesce(affs.company_name, 'Unknown') as "name"
from
  gha_repos r,
  gha_commits c
left join
  gha_actors_affiliations affs
on
  c.author_id = affs.actor_id
  and affs.dt_from <= c.dup_created_at
  and affs.dt_to > c.dup_created_at
where
  c.dup_repo_id = r.id
  and c.dup_repo_name = r.name
  and r.repo_group in ([[repogroups]])
  and $__timeFilter(c.dup_created_at)
  and affs.company_name is not null
  and (c.dup_author_login in ([[contributors]]) or '[[contributors:csv]]' = 'null')
  and lower(c.dup_author_login) not like all(array['devstats-sync', 'googlebot', 'coveralls', 'rktbot', 'coreosbot', 'web-flow', 'prometheus-roobot', 'cncf-bot', 'kernelprbot', 'istio-testing', 'spinnakerbot', 'pikbot', 'spinnaker-release', 'docker-jenkins', 'golangcibot', 'opencontrail-ci-admin', 'k8s-%', '%-bot', '%-robot', 'bot-%', 'robot-%', '%[bot]%', '%-jenkins', '%-ci%bot', '%-testing', 'codecov-%', '%clabot%', '%cla-bot%', '%-gerrit', '%-bot-%'])
group by
  affs.company_name
order by
  value desc
limit
  50

select
  count(distinct c.sha) as "value",
  c.dup_author_login as "name"
from
  gha_commits c,
  gha_repos r
where
  c.dup_repo_id = r.id
  and c.dup_repo_name = r.name
  and r.repo_group in ([[repogroups]])
  and $__timeFilter(c.dup_created_at)
  and c.dup_author_login != ''
  and (c.dup_author_login in ([[contributors]]) or '[[contributors:csv]]' = 'null')
  and lower(c.dup_author_login) not like all(array['ti-srebot', 'devstats-sync', 'googlebot', 'coveralls', 'rktbot', 'coreosbot', 'web-flow', 'prometheus-roobot', 'cncf-bot', 'kernelprbot', 'istio-testing', 'spinnakerbot', 'pikbot', 'spinnaker-release', 'docker-jenkins', 'golangcibot', 'opencontrail-ci-admin', 'k8s-%', '%-bot', '%-robot', 'bot-%', 'robot-%', '%[bot]%', '%-jenkins', '%-ci%bot', '%-testing', 'codecov-%', '%clabot%', '%cla-bot%', '%-gerrit', '%-bot-%'])
group by
  c.dup_author_login
order by
  value desc
limit
  50

select
  now() as "time",
  count(distinct pr.id) as "value",
  'PRs' as "metric"
from
  gha_pull_requests pr,
  gha_repos r
where
  pr.dup_repo_id = r.id
  and pr.dup_repo_name = r.name
  and r.repo_group in ([[repogroups]])
  and (pr.dup_user_login in ([[contributors]]) or '[[contributors:csv]]' = 'null')
  and pr.dup_type = 'PullRequestEvent'
  and $__timeFilter(pr.created_at)
  and lower(pr.dup_user_login) not like all(array['ti-srebot', 'devstats-sync', 'googlebot', 'coveralls', 'rktbot', 'coreosbot', 'web-flow', 'prometheus-roobot', 'cncf-bot', 'kernelprbot', 'istio-testing', 'spinnakerbot', 'pikbot', 'spinnaker-release', 'docker-jenkins', 'golangcibot', 'opencontrail-ci-admin', 'k8s-%', '%-bot', '%-robot', 'bot-%', 'robot-%', '%[bot]%', '%-jenkins', '%-ci%bot', '%-testing', 'codecov-%', '%clabot%', '%cla-bot%', '%-gerrit', '%-bot-%'])

select
  now() as "time",
  count(distinct i.id) as "value",
  'Issues' as "metric"
from
  gha_issues i,
  gha_repos r
where
  i.dup_repo_id = r.id
  and i.dup_repo_name = r.name
  and r.repo_group in ([[repogroups]])
  and i.dup_type = 'IssuesEvent'
  and $__timeFilter(i.created_at)
  and (i.dup_user_login in ([[contributors]]) or '[[contributors:csv]]' = 'null')
  and lower(i.dup_user_login) not like all(array['ti-srebot', 'devstats-sync', 'googlebot', 'coveralls', 'rktbot', 'coreosbot', 'web-flow', 'prometheus-roobot', 'cncf-bot', 'kernelprbot', 'istio-testing', 'spinnakerbot', 'pikbot', 'spinnaker-release', 'docker-jenkins', 'golangcibot', 'opencontrail-ci-admin', 'k8s-%', '%-bot', '%-robot', 'bot-%', 'robot-%', '%[bot]%', '%-jenkins', '%-ci%bot', '%-testing', 'codecov-%', '%clabot%', '%cla-bot%', '%-gerrit', '%-bot-%'])

select
  now() as "time",
  count(distinct pr.event_id) as "value",
  'Reviews' as "metric"
from
  gha_pull_requests pr,
  gha_repos r
where
  pr.dup_repo_id = r.id
  and pr.dup_repo_name = r.name
  and r.repo_group in ([[repogroups]])
  and pr.dup_type = 'PullRequestReviewCommentEvent'
  and $__timeFilter(pr.dup_created_at)
  and (pr.dup_actor_login in ([[contributors]]) or '[[contributors:csv]]' = 'null')
  and lower(pr.dup_actor_login) not like all(array['ti-srebot', 'devstats-sync', 'googlebot', 'coveralls', 'rktbot', 'coreosbot', 'web-flow', 'prometheus-roobot', 'cncf-bot', 'kernelprbot', 'istio-testing', 'spinnakerbot', 'pikbot', 'spinnaker-release', 'docker-jenkins', 'golangcibot', 'opencontrail-ci-admin', 'k8s-%', '%-bot', '%-robot', 'bot-%', 'robot-%', '%[bot]%', '%-jenkins', '%-ci%bot', '%-testing', 'codecov-%', '%clabot%', '%cla-bot%', '%-gerrit', '%-bot-%'])

select
    now() as "time",
  count(distinct e.id) as "value",
  'Comments' as "metric"
from
  gha_events e,
  gha_repos r
where
  e.repo_id = r.id
  and e.dup_repo_name = r.name
  and r.repo_group in ([[repogroups]])
  and e.type in ('IssueCommentEvent', 'CommitCommentEvent')
  and $__timeFilter(e.created_at)
  and (e.dup_actor_login in ([[contributors]]) or '[[contributors:csv]]' = 'null')
  and lower(e.dup_actor_login) not like all(array['ti-srebot', 'devstats-sync', 'googlebot', 'coveralls', 'rktbot', 'coreosbot', 'web-flow', 'prometheus-roobot', 'cncf-bot', 'kernelprbot', 'istio-testing', 'spinnakerbot', 'pikbot', 'spinnaker-release', 'docker-jenkins', 'golangcibot', 'opencontrail-ci-admin', 'k8s-%', '%-bot', '%-robot', 'bot-%', 'robot-%', '%[bot]%', '%-jenkins', '%-ci%bot', '%-testing', 'codecov-%', '%clabot%', '%cla-bot%', '%-gerrit', '%-bot-%'])

select
  now() as "time",
  count(distinct c.sha) as "value",
  'Commits' as "metric"
from
  gha_commits c,
  gha_repos r
where
  c.dup_repo_id = r.id
  and c.dup_repo_name = r.name
  and r.repo_group in ([[repogroups]])
  and $__timeFilter(c.dup_created_at)
  and (c.dup_author_login in ([[contributors]]) or '[[contributors:csv]]' = 'null')
  and lower(c.dup_author_login) not like all(array['ti-srebot', 'devstats-sync', 'googlebot', 'coveralls', 'rktbot', 'coreosbot', 'web-flow', 'prometheus-roobot', 'cncf-bot', 'kernelprbot', 'istio-testing', 'spinnakerbot', 'pikbot', 'spinnaker-release', 'docker-jenkins', 'golangcibot', 'opencontrail-ci-admin', 'k8s-%', '%-bot', '%-robot', 'bot-%', 'robot-%', '%[bot]%', '%-jenkins', '%-ci%bot', '%-testing', 'codecov-%', '%clabot%', '%cla-bot%', '%-gerrit', '%-bot-%'])
order by
  "metric"

select
  $__timeGroupAlias(e.created_at,1h),
  count(distinct e.id) as "contributions"
from
  gha_events e,
  gha_repos r
where
  e.repo_id = r.id
  and e.dup_repo_name = r.name
  and r.repo_group in ([[repogroups]])
  and $__timeFilter(e.created_at)
  and e.type in ('IssuesEvent', 'PullRequestEvent', 'PushEvent', 'PullRequestReviewCommentEvent', 'IssueCommentEvent', 'CommitCommentEvent')
  and (e.dup_actor_login in ([[contributors]]) or '[[contributors:csv]]' = 'null')
  and lower(e.dup_actor_login) not like all(array['devstats-sync', 'googlebot', 'coveralls', 'rktbot', 'coreosbot', 'web-flow', 'prometheus-roobot', 'cncf-bot', 'kernelprbot', 'istio-testing', 'spinnakerbot', 'pikbot', 'spinnaker-release', 'docker-jenkins', 'golangcibot', 'opencontrail-ci-admin', 'k8s-%', '%-bot', '%-robot', 'bot-%', 'robot-%', '%[bot]%', '%-jenkins', '%-ci%bot', '%-testing', 'codecov-%', '%clabot%', '%cla-bot%', '%-gerrit', '%-bot-%'])
group by
  1

list.definition: select distinct repo_group from gha_repos where repo_group is not null order by 1
list.label: Repository groups
list.name: repogroups
list.query: select distinct repo_group from gha_repos where repo_group is not null order by 1

list.definition: select sub.actor from (select e.dup_actor_login as actor, count(distinct e.id) as cnt from gha_events e, gha_repos r where $__timeFilter(e.created_at) and e.repo_id = r.id and e.dup_repo_name = r.name and r.repo_group in ($repogroups) and lower(dup_actor_login) not like all(array['devstats-sync', 'googlebot', 'coveralls', 'rktbot', 'coreosbot', 'web-flow', 'prometheus-roobot', 'cncf-bot', 'kernelprbot', 'istio-testing', 'spinnakerbot', 'pikbot', 'spinnaker-release', 'docker-jenkins', 'golangcibot', 'opencontrail-ci-admin', 'k8s-%', '%-bot', '%-robot', 'bot-%', 'robot-%', '%[bot]%', '%-jenkins', '%-ci%bot', '%-testing', 'codecov-%', '%clabot%', '%cla-bot%', '%-gerrit', '%-bot-%']) group by e.dup_actor_login order by cnt desc limit 200) sub
list.label: Contributors
list.name: contributors
list.query: select sub.actor from (select e.dup_actor_login as actor, count(distinct e.id) as cnt from gha_events e, gha_repos r where $__timeFilter(e.created_at) and e.repo_id = r.id and e.dup_repo_name = r.name and r.repo_group in ($repogroups) and lower(dup_actor_login) not like all(array['devstats-sync', 'googlebot', 'coveralls', 'rktbot', 'coreosbot', 'web-flow', 'prometheus-roobot', 'cncf-bot', 'kernelprbot', 'istio-testing', 'spinnakerbot', 'pikbot', 'spinnaker-release', 'docker-jenkins', 'golangcibot', 'opencontrail-ci-admin', 'k8s-%', '%-bot', '%-robot', 'bot-%', 'robot-%', '%[bot]%', '%-jenkins', '%-ci%bot', '%-testing', 'codecov-%', '%clabot%', '%cla-bot%', '%-gerrit', '%-bot-%']) group by e.dup_actor_login order by cnt desc limit 200) sub
